definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: Since last week, police have interviewed members of the polygamist sect looking for evidence.
sentences.chinese: 警方自上周起询问了一夫多妻组织的成员，搜集证据。

sentences.english: The teen escaped from a polygamist community.
sentences.chinese: 那位青少年逃离了某个一夫多妻的社区。

sentences.english: Then you're going to have a situation that would normally promote high levels of polygyny.
sentences.chinese: 如果存在上述情形，通常都会加剧一夫多妻的程度。

sentences.english: You can hear the whisperings about a polygamous father.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以听到有关爸爸一夫多妻的耳语。

sentences.english: Often, though, the wives are unaware of the polygamous situation.
sentences.chinese: 然而通常妻子都没有察觉到一夫多妻的状态。

sentences.english: Dr Pollet tests it by studying polygamous households.
sentences.chinese: 波兰特教授通过对一夫多妻家庭的研究来证明。

definition: to regard men as superior to women (idiom)
forced marriage/arranged marriage (without the consent of the individuals)
to value males and attach less importance to females (idiom)
to cohabit with and financially support a mistress
